feed.title: OpenSign Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.2.2-beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump @babel/traverse from 7.23.0 to 7.23.6 in /microfrontends/SignDocuments by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/262
  • chore(deps): bump parse from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 in /microfrontends/SignDocuments by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/266
  • chore(deps): bump react-pdf from 7.4.0 to 7.7.0 in /microfrontends/SignDocuments by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/325
  • build(deps-dev): bump postcss from 8.4.31 to 8.4.35 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/390
  • refactor: remove openai package by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/416
  • build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 3 directories with 9 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/415
  • build(deps): bump axios from 1.3.5 to 1.6.7 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/361
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group group in /microfrontends/SignDocuments with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/291
  • build(deps-dev): bump @babel/runtime-corejs2 from 7.23.2 to 7.23.9 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/358
  • refactor: update jwt-decode package by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/417
  • build(deps-dev): bump lint-staged from 15.0.1 to 15.2.2 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/389
  • build(deps): bump mongoose from 7.2.1 to 8.1.3 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/405
  • build(deps): bump @react-pdf/renderer from 3.1.12 to 3.3.8 in /microfrontends/SignDocuments by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/388
  • chore: add build command for docker-hub by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/425
  • chore: update build command of microfrontend for dockerhub by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/427

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.2.1-beta...v1.2.2-beta

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.3.0-beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add multiple widgets like dropdown list, radio button, label, text input, checkbox, date, image etc. by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/461
  • fix: signature not saving in manage sign option by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/469
  • fix: remove instant signing alert when the document creator is not the first in sequence to sign a document which is set to be signed in order by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/471
  • build(deps-dev): bump nodemon from 2.0.22 to 3.1.0 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/435
  • build(deps): bump parse-server-api-mail-adapter from 3.0.0 to 3.1.1 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/436
  • build(deps): bump mongoose from 8.1.3 to 8.2.0 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/437
  • build(deps): bump nodemailer from 6.9.7 to 6.9.11 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/459
  • build(deps): bump react-select from 5.7.7 to 5.8.0 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/445
  • build(deps-dev): bump autoprefixer from 10.4.16 to 10.4.18 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/456
  • build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group group in /apps/OpenSignServer with 7 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/464
  • build(deps): bump aws-sdk from 2.1475.0 to 2.1569.0 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/458
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 1.9.7 to 2.2.1 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/447
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 6.16.0 to 6.22.3 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/466

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.2.2-beta...v1.3.0-beta

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.3.1-beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add help for select folder input & update dashboard tour messages by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/485
  • feat: add show/hide label in checkbox and radio widget by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/487
  • fix: E-sign not available in completed document by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/484
  • fix: reset button not working in forms by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/486
  • fix: legacy signature widget setting icon issue by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/472
  • fix: radio button or checkbox widget’s border not visible by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/488
  • fix: checkbox not embeding in pdf by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/489
  • fix: date is not changable in signyourself flow for mobile by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/490 L

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.3.0-beta...v1.3.1-beta

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: 1.3.2-beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add create document btn in dashboard, update menu & change Root to Opensign™ drive in folder input by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/492
  • fix: stop showing initial popup when widgets drag by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/493
  • fix: handle uncaught error of SMTP by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/500
  • fix: width issue of text widget & default data for widgets information pop-ups in mobile display. by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/499
  • fix: handle uncaught err of max upload size of pdf in form by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/502
  • fix: show warning on placeholder_sign page for document already send to signers for signature by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/501
  • chore: change serverURL by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/503
  • chore: Update mongo url in local env by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/504
  • fix: widgets are not embedding in pdf using API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/505

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.3.1-beta...1.3.2-beta

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.4.0-beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: implement feature to duplicate widgets by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/534
  • feat: allow modifying recipient sequence when send-in-order is enabled during edit document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/518
  • feat: Add multiple color support for text signature by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/522
  • fix: fix draft report issue where all drafts were not displayed by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/517
  • fix: data fetching issue in openSign drive - only first 100 records were visible by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/515
  • fix: change text-input widget to text in signyour-self flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/519
  • fix: issue of cannot post /login in local docker setup by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/523
  • fix: parse server not connecting to correct mongo in local docker setup by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/524
  • fix: move document to folder in opensigndrive not working by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/535
  • refactor: migrate redux to redux-toolkit by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/508
  • Refactor: Add lazy loading to improve performance by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/513
  • build(deps): update dependencies by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/1.3.2-beta...v1.4.0-beta
